Black Jack and Kegs and Mully chopped to pieces because they broke the rules?!|I didn't say it was alright! I'm saying they shouldn't have been there.|[[Grenn]] and [[Eddison Tollett]]|The Mountain and the Viper}}'''Kegs''' is a minor character in the [[Season 4|fourth season]]. He is a Builder of the [[Night's Watch]]. He is played by guest star [[Tim Landers]] and only appears in "[[The Mountain and the Viper]]".
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Kegs is a [[Builder]] of the Night's Watch. He is noted to be slow. He is not killed in a wildling attack on Mole's Town. During the battle, while retreating with other defenders to the stair, Kegs is caught and nearly killed by a [[Thenn]], but he is saved by a crossbow shot from Satin. So far he is alive and well.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 4]]===
Along with [[Jack Bulwer|Black Jack Bulwer]] and [[Mully]], he travels to the [[Prostitution|brothel]] in [[Mole's Town]]. They sit drinking and listening to a [[Mole's Town|whore]] belching out the melodies to popular songs. Kegs guesses that she is belching "[[The Rains of Castamere (song)|The Rains of Castamere]]", and she chastises him for getting it wrong. They are later slaughtered when a group of [[wildlings]] led by [[Tormund]] and [[Styr]] attack the village. News of their deaths soon reaches [[Castle Black]].<ref>"[[The Mountain and the Viper]]"</ref>
